languages.text: "Моя спутница вправе убить любого на этом корабле. Вы же — прах и не смеете прикасаться к ней. Ясно?"
"My companion is within her rights to kill anyone on this ship. Her accusers, on the other hand, are naught but dust. Do not touch her. Is that clear?"
languages.original_text: "Моя спутница вправе убить любого на этом корабле. Вы же — прах и не смеете прикасаться к ней. Ясно?"

traits.locale_text: "My companion is within her rights to kill anyone on this ship. You, on the other hand, are dust. Do not dare touch her. Is that clear?"
"My companion is within her rights to kill anyone on this ship. You, on the other hand, are dust. Do not dare touch her. Is that clear?"
"My companion is within her rights to kill anyone on this ship. You, on the other hand, are naught but dust. Do not touch her. Is that clear?"
"My companion is within her rights to kill anyone on this ship. You, on the other hand, are naught but dust. Do not touch her. Is that clear?"
"My companion is within her rights to kill anyone on this ship. Her accusers, on the other hand, are naught but dust. Do not touch her. Is that clear?"
"My companion is within her rights to kill anyone on this ship. Her accusers, on the other hand, are naught but dust. Do not touch her. Is that clear?"

languages.text: « Ma camarade a le droit de tuer n'importe qui à bord de ce vaisseau. Ses accusateurs, en revanche, ne sont à mes yeux que poussière. Je vous interdis de la toucher. C'est bien clair ? »
languages.original_text: "My companion is within her rights to kill anyone on this ship. Her accusers, on the other hand, are naught but dust. Do not touch her. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: « Ma camarade a le droit de tuer n'importe qui à bord de ce vaisseau. Ses accusateurs, en revanche, ne sont à mes yeux que poussière. Je vous interdis de la toucher. C'est bien clair ? »

languages.text: «Mi compañera tiene derecho a matar a cualquiera en esta nave. Por otra parte, sus acusadores son simple polvo. Que nadie la toque, ¿queda claro?».
languages.original_text: "My companion is within her rights to kill anyone on this ship. Her accusers, on the other hand, are naught but dust. Do not touch her. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: «Mi compañera tiene derecho a matar a cualquiera en esta nave. Por otra parte, sus acusadores son simple polvo. Que nadie la toque, ¿queda claro?».

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}の連れは、この船の誰であろうと手にかける権利がある。一方で彼女を責めるもの達は、ほんの塵にすぎない。彼女に手を出すな。分かったか？」
languages.original_text: "My companion is within her rights to kill anyone on this ship. Her accusers, on the other hand, are naught but dust. Do not touch her. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}の連れは、この船の誰であろうと手にかける権利がある。一方で彼女を責めるもの達は、ほんの塵にすぎない。彼女に手を出すな。分かったか？」

languages.text: “在这艘船上，我这位伙伴想杀谁就可以杀谁。至于那些指控她的人，不过是群蝼蚁而已。谁都不准碰她，都听清楚了吗？”
languages.original_text: "My companion is within her rights to kill anyone on this ship. Her accusers, on the other hand, are naught but dust. Do not touch her. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: “在这艘船上，我这位伙伴想杀谁就可以杀谁。至于那些指控她的人，不过是群蝼蚁而已。谁都不准碰她，都听清楚了吗？”

languages.text: "Meine Gefährtin hat das Recht, jeden an Bord dieses Schiffes zu töten. Ihre Ankläger hingegen sind nichts als Staub. Krümmt ihr kein Haar. Ist das klar?"
languages.original_text: "My companion is within her rights to kill anyone on this ship. Her accusers, on the other hand, are naught but dust. Do not touch her. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: "Meine Gefährtin hat das Recht, jeden an Bord dieses Schiffes zu töten. Ihre Ankläger hingegen sind nichts als Staub. Krümmt ihr kein Haar. Ist das klar?"

languages.text: "Yoldaşım, gemideki herhangi birini öldürebilme hakkını elinde bulunduruyor. Öte yandan onu suçlayanlar ise toz zerresinden farksız. Ona dokunayım demeyin. Anlaşıldı mı?"
languages.original_text: "My companion is within her rights to kill anyone on this ship. Her accusers, on the other hand, are naught but dust. Do not touch her. Is that clear?"
